title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Gruden's Downfall and Cardinals GM Steve Keim on Rosen to Kyler Pivot, Inside D-Hop Trade
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Gruden's Downfall and Cardinals GM Steve Keim on Rosen to Kyler Pivot, Inside D-Hop Trade
description:
Colin recalls his personal experience with Jon Gruden, and why Gruden reminds him of arguably the most infamous coach in sports history (3:00). Then Cardinals GM Steve Keim and Colin discuss some hard choices he's had to make, the decision to move off Josh Rosen for Kyler Murray (12:00), what made Steve know that Kyler was a "generational talent" (14:00), what he learned playing for Jimmy Johnson in Miami (23:00), how he approaches his job as a general manager (26:00), the challenges of building a top defense in today's NFL (28:00), dealing with the constant stress of his position (33:00), his unique relationship with his owner (35:00), how much his rivals affect his decision-making (36:00), why Steve says free agency is "fool's gold" (38:00), and the incredible inside story behind trading for DeAndre Hopkins (39:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!
